scripts.ci:build: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.frontend:dev:local: cd frontend && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV=dev npm run dev
scripts.frontend:dev:somnia: cd frontend && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV=somnia npm run dev
scripts.bc:deploy:contract:local: rm -rf ignition/deployments && npm run bc:compile && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/carve.ts --network localhost
scripts.bc:deploy:contract:somnia: rm -rf ignition/deployments && npm run bc:compile && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/carve.ts --network somnia
scripts.bc:compile: npx hardhat compile && cp artifacts/contracts/carve.sol/carve.json frontend/app/contracts/
